text: Good Hair Day (also called ghd) is an English hair stylingProbe on Hair Salons Cheque ; retrieved on 2007-11-22 company. It is the UK's leading maker of hair irons and hair products. Leading Make in Hair Styling Irons; retrieved on 2007-11-26 == Ownership == Good Hair Day is owned by Jemella Group. The company was started in 2001 by Martin Penny, Gary Douglas and Robert Powls.
